system.effect: Allows Transporting of up to 100 psykers in solitary confinement cells. When secured in a cell, a psyker has -60 to all Focus Power Tests to activate psychic abilities, or any other test involving warp powers. +50 Achievement Points towards Criminal Endeavours. -3 Morale while bay is in use.
